summary: Coterra Energy is the first operator to fully automate and control hydraulic fracturing design and execution.

headline: Halliburton & Coterra Introduce Next-Gen Automated Fracturing Solution
summary: HAL partners with Coterra Energy to introduce the Octiv Auto Frac service, automating hydraulic fracturing for enhanced efficiency and control across operations.
